title: Warm chicory and pine nut salad
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1/2 tablespoon lemon juice', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 heads chicory', '5 tablespoons pine nuts', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, for garnish']
